name: ExositeExoHome™
0:
”"Alexa, turn on my fan"”
”"Alexa, turn off my air purifier"”
”"Alexa, set my light to 20 percent"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
ExoHome™ enables you to develop a connected solution to remotely manage Exosite-enabled home devices with an out-of-the-box toolkit that significantly reduces development time and lowers investment costs to accelerate your success. 

The ExoHome™ skill provides the following features:

• On/off
“Alexa, turn on the [device name].”
“Alexa, turn off the [device name].”
• Percentage
“Alexa, set [device name] to [number] percent.”
“Alexa, increase [device name] by [number] percent.”
“Alexa, decrease [device name] by [number] percent.”

Download ExoHome™ to develop your smart-home product today.
